content: I don't have personal experience of traveling in south africa, nor am i affiliated with any tour operator. however, there are many reputable safari tour operators in south africa that offer great experiences. you can do some research online or consult with a trusted travel agent to find a tour that fits your budget and interests. some of the famous south african game reserves include kruger national park, sabi sand game reserve, shamwari game reserve, and madikwe game reserve. consider factors such as the duration of the safari, accommodation types, included activities, and the size of the group when choosing from different safari tours.
